components.name: AvatarView
components.description: Circular avatar with image, initials, bot, and saved modes in 12 sizes

components.name: ChipsView
components.description: Filter chip with Default, Active, and Avatar states in two sizes (32dp, 40dp)

components.name: CheckboxView
components.description: Checkbox with square and circle shapes, optional label text, and enabled/disabled states

components.name: AttachedMediaView
components.description: File and media attachments with error states and file type previews
